text:
is a Japanese professional wrestler. He is best known for competing in New Japan Pro Wrestling from 1972 to 2006. He has been competing for Dradition since 2004.
He was the innovator of both the Dragon sleeper and Dragon suplex wrestling movies. He used them as his finishing moves.
He has a son named Leona who is also a professional wrestler and made his debut on November 19, 2013.
On March 28, 2015, he was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame by Ric Flair.
